WindowsDDK (new versions are called "Windows Driver Kit")
- Used by the "HID"-classes inside "PLInput" (statically linked and therefore without additional external dependencies)
- We're sorry but due to legal issues we can't provide you with a downloadable package
- Download from: http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/Devtools/wdk/default.mspx
- Here's what you need for the Windows platform and where to put the files:
	- "External\_Windows_x86_32\WindowsDDK\include"
	- "External\_Windows_x86_32\WindowsDDK\lib"
